TextBlock.Text: CASSAVA: Daz, if you have come to visit me again as I predicted, I have returned to the Construction Yard for some impromptu work. Please wait here in my dwelling for me, or come find me at the yard if your patience runs dry!
CASSAVA: Of note: If you are able, I would also love if you could fetch your tools to modify a scroll wall at the yard. I had an idea to expedite our workflow at the yard!

CASSAVA: I would like you to modify the scroll wall to be writable from <color=orange>both front and rear ends.</color> This would allow us to condense more information into a single scroll, and more conveniently update schematics as we iterate!
DAZ: You are too sharp, my love! I came to ask for your help in untangling another orcnid on Bramble Island.. So many become trapped on the bramble vines under the island..

DAZ: I know this isn't your favorite pasttime.. But we must help these poor creatures! And with <color=#99B200ff>my new invention,</color> I believe this will be <color=orange>a much easier and safer</color> affair for us as well!
CASSAVA: Oh, thank goodness! I dread the possibility of being zapped yet again, no matter how many precautions I take..
